sourcesContent:
import './App.css';
import React, {Component} from 'react'
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button';
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card';

export default class AddTaskComponent extends Component {
    render() {   
        return(
            <Card className='bg-dark text-white m-5'>
                <Form>
                <Card.Header>
                <Card.Title>Add Task</Card.Title>
                </Card.Header>
                <Card.Body className='bg-dark-blue'>
                        <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="title">
                            <Form.Label>Title</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Enter title" />
                        </Form.Group>

                        <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="description">
                            <Form.Label>Description</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="What is the task?" />
                        </Form.Group>

                        <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="link">
                            <Form.Label>Link</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Link to task" />
                        </Form.Group>

                        <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="start">
                            <Form.Label>Start Date</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control type="date" />
                        </Form.Group>

                        <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="end">
                            <Form.Label>Deadline</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control type="date" />
                        </Form.Group>
                        </Card.Body>
                        <Card.Footer>
                        <Button variant="success" type="submit">
                            Submit
                        </Button>
                        </Card.Footer>
                    </Form>  
            </Card>
        );
    }
}
